resources.string:
This is an unofficial reader for Gunshow Comic (http://gunshowcomic.com) created by KC Green.
If you have any comment or question, feel free to contact me at deggial.cfr@gmail.com 

 This app is based on LectorBunsen made by Paulino Calderon.

 Comic Viewer
This project uses "ComicViewer" (https://github.com/tcoxon/ComicViewer) by tcoxon. 

 Source Code and Resources
You can find the source code of this app on https://github.com/deggialcfr/GunshowReader under GPL license. Icon is by KCGreen.
